Donald Trump: s donation of Play-Doh brand modeling clay to Louisiana flood victims was verified through a photograph taken by the news media, showing him unloading a box of Play-Doh at a church in St. Amant.
The authenticity of the claim was furthe: which clearly showed that the donations included more than just Play-Doh, such as diapers, baby formula, various toys, cleaning supplies, socks, blankets, and school supplies.
CNN and The Creole: an online news source for Ascension Parish in Louisiana, reported that Trump himself had donated an 18-wheeler full of supplies, confirming his contribution.
